attributes.action: Reject any suggestion of a state funeral for Margaret Thatcher
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has been suggested that the Government is considering a state funeral for Margaret Thatcher when she dies.  This petition urges the Government to reject any such suggestion for the following primary reasons:

The cost, which taxpayers can ill afford

The divisive effect that any such funeral would have on the nation

The lack of any modern precedent for such a move: Winston Churchill was a unique case in that he united Britain during an unavoidable war which the nation was forced to enter.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
